original_title: Kako sam sistematski uništen od idiota
overview: The film follows a life of a homeless, but very well read, Marxist who is coping with Che's death and wishes to live a life of revolutions and workers' uprisings. He is a hypochondriac, bitter at the world, and blaming his old capitalist boss for his life's misery.
title: How I Was Systematically Destroyed by Idiots
